name: summarizer
title: AI Text Summarizer with Recursive Chunking
description: Summarizes long text documents using AI via OpenRouter with intelligent recursive chunking. Access 100+ LLM models including GPT-4o, Claude 3.5, Llama 3.1, and more. Handles documents of any length by breaking them into manageable chunks, summarizing each, and recursively combining summaries until a final concise summary is produced. Supports customizable summary lengths and system prompts.
